name: @maany/mpc-node
description: Node.js bindings for the Maany MPC core library

scripts.copy: node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const src=path.resolve(__dirname,'../../build/bindings/node/maany_mpc_node.node');const dst=path.resolve(__dirname,'maany_mpc_node.node');if(!fs.existsSync(src)){throw new Error('Addon build output not found at '+src);}fs.copyFileSync(src,dst);"
scripts.prepare: npm run configure && npm run build && npm run copy
